oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Window display at department store
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Loveman, Berger, and Teitlebaum Department Store at 5th and Union. View of display window featuring 1862 women's clothing on mannequins and small dolls. A card in the window names an item as property of Mrs. Geo. L. Price.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Clothing; Clothing and dress; Women's clothing; Fashion merchandising; Merchandising; Women's clothing industry; Stores, Retail; Department stores--United States; Display of merchandise; Dolls
Stores & shops; Department stores; Clothing industry; Fashion industry; Mannequins; Clothing stores; Window displays; Merchandise displays
